description.raw:
The brew pull requests were not created successfully for two recent releases due to an error in the brew scripts:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater&build=607)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/607/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/607/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater&build=608)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/608/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/608/

They both have the following errors:

~~~
++ git -C /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Taps/osrf/homebrew-simulation fetch --unshallow
fatal: --unshallow on a complete repository does not make sense
Build step 'Execute shell' marked build as failure
~~~

I'm not sure why it is failing now, but I just added an `|| true` to ignore the error and now it's passing.

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater&build=609)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/609/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/609/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater&build=610)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/610/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/610/
